programme.title: The Ghost of Charnel House
programme.desc: After an abandoned slaughterhouse is turned into modern lofts in an urban neighbourhood, tenants are haunted by a dark secret that has been trapped in the building for more than 30 years. Horror, starring Callum Blue, Nadine Velazquez and Makenzie Moss.

programme.desc: Premiere. Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jackie Chan, Dave Franco and Fred Armisen.

programme.title: Journey to Oz
programme.desc: The cunning Urfin wants to become ruler of Magic Land. With an army of wooden soldiers, he captures the Emerald City, but the arrival of Dorothy, the tin man and lion looks like scuppering his plans. Animated adventure, with the voice of Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: When the creator of a device able to record and play a person's memories is found dead, his reclusive wife delves deeper into her own private world to crack the mystery. Hi-tech murdery mystery, starring Peter Dinklage, Matt Ellis and Jordana Largy.(n)

programme.desc: When a scientist studies the differences between the male and female brain, her findings dictate how she lives her life. Comedy directed by and starring 2 Broke Girls creator Whitney Cummings, with Sofia Vergara and Toby Kebbell.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. After an abandoned slaughterhouse is turned into modern lofts in an urban neighbourhood, tenants are haunted by a dark secret that has been trapped in the building for more than 30 years. Horror, starring Callum Blue, Nadine Velazquez and Makenzie Moss.(n)

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A smooth-talking chauffeur employs his natural charm to enjoy a string of casual liaisons with a host of women - but as he tires of his bed-hopping antics, he struggles to work out what is missing from his life. Comedy drama remake, starring Jude Law, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon and Marisa Tomei.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: A spoilt wealthy teenager challenges her equally cruel stepbrother to seduce a newcomer at their school, who has pledged to remain a virgin until she marries. The practised charmer agrees to the task - especially since his stepsister has offered to sleep with him if he succeeds - only to find himself falling in love. Drama based on Dangerous Liaisons, with Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Selma Blair.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for her father's playboy employer, but when he rejects her she flees to Paris. On her return, however, he is smitten by the alluring woman she has become - even though he is about to be married. To ensure the wedding takes place, his older brother decides to woo the beauty himself. Comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, William Holden, Humphrey Bogart and Walter Hampden.

programme.title: Carousel
programme.desc: A criminal struggling to support his pregnant wife dies during a botched armed robbery, but is given the chance to return to life 15 years later to help his family and teach his daughter a valuable lesson. Adaptation of Rodgers and Hammerstein's musical, starring Gordon MacRae, Shirley Jones, Cameron Mitchell, Barbara Ruick and Gene Lockhart.

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An international art dealer must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his marriage to a woman whose dreams will lead them all on an extraordinary journey. Drama, starring Greg Kinnear, Renee Zellweger and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: An airline pilot with a history of heavy drinking and drug use successfully lands a plane that suffers mechanical problems during a fierce storm, saving the lives of nearly everyone on board. While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An international art dealer must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his marriage to a woman whose dreams will lead them all on an extraordinary journey. Drama, starring Greg Kinnear, Renee Zellweger and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Flight

While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: All the Right Moves
programme.desc: A hot-headed high-school football player is eager to escape his depression-hit Pennsylvania steeltown by winning a sporting scholarship to college - a dream jeopardised by friction with an equally ambitious coach. Sporting drama, starring Tom Cruise, Craig T Nelson, Lea Thompson and Charles Cioffi.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: A tough, embittered US marine sergeant sets out to mould a group of raw recruits into men fit for action against the Japanese in the Pacific during the Second World War. Although his training methods are often brutal, his controversial approach looks set to pay dividends when they finally see real combat. Adventure, starring John Wayne, John Agar, Adele Mara and Forrest Tucker.

programme.title: Custody
programme.desc: Three women are brought together when a hard-working single mother has her children taken away. Courtroom drama, starring Viola Davis and Hayden Panettiere.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
programme.desc: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire the creation of Wonder Woman. Biopic, starring Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall and Bella Heathcote.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country singer Johnny Cash. Traumatised by the death of his brother as a child and scorned by his father, Cash leaves Arkansas to serve in the US Air Force in Germany, where he starts to write songs. Although reaching a high point in his career touring alongside Elvis and Jerry Lee Lewis, he descends into drink and drug addiction, while fellow singer and future wife June Carter seems to be the only person standing between him and self-destruction. With Joaquin Phoenix and an Oscar-winning Reese Witherspoon.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal.

programme.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
programme.desc: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire the creation of Wonder Woman. Biopic, starring Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall and Bella Heathcote.

programme.title: Walk the Line

Traumatised by the death of his brother as a child and scorned by his father, Cash leaves Arkansas to serve in the US Air Force in Germany, where he starts to write songs. Although reaching a high point in his career touring alongside Elvis and Jerry Lee Lewis, he descends into drink and drug addiction, while fellow singer and future wife June Carter seems to be the only person standing between him and self-destruction. With Joaquin Phoenix and an Oscar-winning Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: Let Me Go
programme.desc: The lives of three generations of women are turned upside down when terrible, long-held secrets tumble into the open. True-life drama, starring Juliet Stevenson, Jodhi May and Lucy Boynton.(n)

programme.title: Tex
programme.desc: A teenager struggles against the odds to take care of his younger brother in the aftermath their mother's death. Drama, starring Matt Dillon, Jim Metzler, Meg Tilly, Bill McKinney, Ben Johnson and Emilio Estevez.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: When a town outcast suspected of murder shows 14 year old Charlie Bucktin a dead body, the teenager attempts to find the killer. Mystery thriller, starring Levi Miller, Aaron McGrath and Angourie Rice.(n)

programme.title: After The Reality
programme.desc: A reality show contestant is forced to drop out of the series and reunites with his estranged sister when their father passes away. Comedy drama, starring Matthew Morrison, Sarah Chalke and Jon Dore.(n)

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.(n)

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Premiere. A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Premiere. A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A Manhattan newspaper columnist is sent to an isolated mountain retreat to recover from alcoholism, where she strives to get back on the straight and narrow with the help of a womanising sports star and a stern guidance counsellor. Drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins, Azura Skye and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A TV actor shuffles through life emotionally numbed by the drugs prescribed for him by his stern psychiatrist father. However, he decides to ditch the pills when returning home for his mother's funeral. Free of medication, his apathy begins to lift, and an eccentric local woman reawakens his joy for life. Romantic drama, written, directed by and starring Zach Braff, with Natalie Portman and Ian Holm.(n)

programme.title: Killing Hasselhoff
programme.desc: A debt-ridden nightclub owner decides to rig his celebrity death pool, which means killing his pick - the star of Knight Rider and Baywatch. Comedy, starring Ken Jeong, Jim Jefferies and David Hasselhoff.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans
programme.desc: A bickering, separated couple on the brink of divorce are thrown back together when they witness a murder. The FBI arrange for them to go into hiding in a remote mountain town, a predicament that could either save their marriage or see them at each other's throats more than ever. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An unreliable but good-natured slob is called upon to look after his trouble-making nephew and nieces while their parents are away - and what starts as a disaster soon changes for the better as the unlikely babysitter gets to grips with the finer points of being a responsible adult. Family comedy, starring John Candy, Macaulay Culkin, Jean Kelly, Gaby Hoffman, Amy Madigan and Laurie Metcalf.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A single TV producer is appalled when a chauvinistic presenter is hired for her morning news show. However, she is forced to seek his help when she meets the man of her dreams, and begins testing his theories on what men find attractive. Romantic comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl, Bree Turner and Eric Winter.

programme.title: Fletch
programme.desc: A wisecracking reporter and master of disguise is approached by a businessman who claims to be terminally ill and is looking to pay someone to kill him. The journalist discovers the supposedly dying man is in perfect health, and his strange request is part of a complex scam. Comedy mystery based on Gregory Mcdonald's novel, with Chevy Chase and Tim Matheson.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoon's illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoon's illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes.

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: The rivalry between two brothers reaches a fever pitch during a charity swimming competition. Comedy, starring Adam Scott, Nick Kroll and Greg Violand.

programme.title: The Brits Are Coming
programme.desc: A con-artist couple set out to settle a gambling debt by pulling off a jewel heist. Crime caper, starring Uma Thurman, Tim Roth and Alice Eve.

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: An ageing British rock band try to revive their fortunes by embarking on a US tour, with a film-maker on hand to record the mayhem. However, the big comeback soon turns into a series of disasters as tensions between the clueless rockers and their long-suffering manager reach breaking point. Spoof documentary, starring Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican woman is offered a well-paid job as housekeeper to a wealthy American celebrity chef, and relocates with her daughter to Los Angeles - but her employer's neurotic wife causes all sorts of problems. Comedy directed by James L Brooks, starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler, Tea Leoni and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New York students travelling through Alabama think they have been arrested for shoplifting so admit their guilt - only to find they have in fact been charged with murder. Fortunately, one of the pair has a cousin who is a lawyer - but his ineptitude and inexperience could do more harm than good. Comedy, starring Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei and Ralph Macchio.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: A group of movie stars gathers in Hollywood for a glamorous housewarming party, only to be faced with the Biblical apocalypse. As demons overrun the world, the celebrities go into hiding, and must rise above their own selfishness if they are to survive. Fantasy comedy, starring James Franco, Jonah Hill, Emma Watson, Michael Cera and co-director Seth Rogen as themselves.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New York students travelling through Alabama think they have been arrested for shoplifting so admit their guilt - only to find they have in fact been charged with murder. Fortunately, one of the pair has a cousin who is a lawyer - but his ineptitude and inexperience could do more harm than good. Comedy, starring Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei and Ralph Macchio.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: A group of movie stars gathers in Hollywood for a glamorous housewarming party, only to be faced with the Biblical apocalypse. As demons overrun the world, the celebrities go into hiding, and must rise above their own selfishness if they are to survive. Fantasy comedy, starring James Franco, Jonah Hill, Emma Watson, Michael Cera and co-director Seth Rogen as themselves.

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer.(n)

programme.title: Larry Gaye: Renegade Male Flight Attendant
programme.desc: A womanising flight attendant springs into action when his cost-cutting airline plans to eliminate jobs. Comedy, starring Mark Feuerstein, Danny Pudi and Jayma Mays.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys D'Movie
programme.desc: The indomitable Irish matriarch discovers that a plan is afoot by developers to buy the famous Dublin street market where her family has run a fruit and veg stall for generations. Assembling a band of eccentric allies, she plans to fight back, only to realise her daughter is not interested in taking over the family business. Comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll and Jennifer Gibney.(n)

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A single crossword compiler goes on a blind date with a news cameraman and is instantly smitten, but he is less keen. When her infatuation gets her fired from her job, she devotes herself to pursuing him across America, determined to convince him they are meant for each other. Romantic comedy, with Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper and Thomas Haden Church.(n)

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: A thirtysomething man has no intention of leaving the family home, so his exasperated parents respond by hiring a woman who earns her living enticing stay-at-home men to fall in love with her and then encouraging them to fly the nest. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew McConaughey, Kathy Bates and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted jewel thief is released from prison, and sets about recovering his hidden loot - only to discover a police station has since been built where he left it. Undeterred, he poses as a maverick cop and worms his way into the detective division - little realising his problems have only just begun. Comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Luke Wilson and Peter Greene.(n)

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair.(n)

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: A Mexican cop-turned-mercenary is hired by a shadowy businessman to assassinate a politician. When he realises his employers have double-crossed him, he joins forces with a band of militant illegal immigrants to seek a suitably bloody revenge. Action thriller, starring Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro and Jessica Alba.

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: An arrogant pilot's maverick flying skills earn him a place in an elite US Navy school, where he comes into conflict with a fellow student and falls for his civilian instructor. A tragedy in the air threatens to end his military career - until an international incident offers him a chance to redeem himself. Aerial action adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards and Tom Skerritt.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, with Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleague's murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers.

programme.title: All About the Money
programme.desc: Two friends are convinced by another to take a holiday in South America, and then discover they are there to capture the US's most wanted criminal - with no military training. Adventure, starring Eddie Griffin, Blake Freeman and Casper Van Dien.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A sailor falls foul of the schemes of his so-called closest friend, and ends up languishing in prison for 13 years, wrongly accused of treason. After spending his sentence plotting revenge on the traitor, he eventually manages to escape and poses as a wealthy nobleman to gain access to his target. Swashbuckling adventure based on the novel by Alexandre Dumas, starring Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris and Dagmara Dominczyk.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: A woman is sent to a psychiatric hospital by her abusive stepfather, and is due to be lobotomised in five days. She retreats into her imagination, seeing herself and her fellow inmates as warriors in a twisted dream world who must overcome a series of challenges to win their freedom. Fantasy adventure, with Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish and Jena Malone.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane.

programme.title: All About the Money
programme.desc: Two friends are convinced by another to take a holiday in South America, and then discover they are there to capture the US's most wanted criminal - with no military training. Adventure, starring Eddie Griffin, Blake Freeman and Casper Van Dien.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A sailor falls foul of the schemes of his so-called closest friend, and ends up languishing in prison for 13 years, wrongly accused of treason. After spending his sentence plotting revenge on the traitor, he eventually manages to escape and poses as a wealthy nobleman to gain access to his target. Swashbuckling adventure based on the novel by Alexandre Dumas, starring Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris and Dagmara Dominczyk.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: A woman is sent to a psychiatric hospital by her abusive stepfather, and is due to be lobotomised in five days. She retreats into her imagination, seeing herself and her fellow inmates as warriors in a twisted dream world who must overcome a series of challenges to win their freedom. Fantasy adventure, with Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish and Jena Malone.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane.

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger.(n)

programme.title: In Harm's Way
programme.desc: Two Navy officers are disgraced in the aftermath of the attack on Pearl Harbour, one for a disastrous engagement with the enemy and the other for a drunken brawl after learning of his wife's death. They get another chance to prove their worth when they are placed in charge of a vital counter-offensive. Second World War drama, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas and Henry Fonda.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A US Air Force veteran ejects his co-pilot from their Stealth bomber in a plan to steal the plane's cargo of nuclear warheads. He uses the weapons to extort money from the American government by threatening to detonate one in a major city. Action thriller, starring John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis and Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.

programme.title: After the Storm
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, a private detective struggles to find child support money and reconnect with his son and ex-wife. Comedy drama, starring Hiroshi Abe, Yoko Maki and Satomi Kobayashi. In Japanese.

programme.title: The Midwife
programme.desc: A midwife gets unexpected news from her father's old mistress, and together they come to terms with his life and death. Drama, starring Catherine Deneuve, Catherine Frot and Olivier Gourmet. In French.

programme.title: Miss Hokusai
programme.desc: The life and works of Japanese artist Katsushika Hokusai, as seen from the eyes of his daughter, Katsushika O-Ei. Animated biopic, featuring the voices of Richard Epcar, Erica Lindbeck and Ezra Weisz.

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally.

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: A basketball hustler working Los Angeles' courts uses his goofy appearance to lull his opponents into a false sense of security. He forms an uneasy alliance with a fellow conman and rival to make a financial killing, but his debts soon catch up with both of them. Ron Shelton's comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes and Rosie Perez.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: Two notorious outlaws' routine of bank and train robberies is cut short when a seemingly unstoppable posse is formed to catch them. The pair plan to flee America and start a new life in Bolivia, with the Sundance Kid's schoolmistress lover in tow - but staying ahead of the law is not so easy. Western, starring Paul Newman, Robert Redford and Katharine Ross.

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: CIA agent Roger Ferris hatches a bold but dangerous plan to capture terrorist Al-Saleem. With the help of Ed Hoffman who is a master of subterfuge, Ferris creates a fake terrorist organization to prompt Al-Saleem out of hiding. Spy thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: Maverick detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan is sent to investigate a killing in a small town when his superiors tire of his no-holds barred approach to law enforcement. The case takes an unexpected turn with the discovery that the killer is a woman seeking revenge on the men who raped her and her sister 10 years previously. Crime thriller sequel, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle and Bradford Dillman.

programme.title: Insyriated
programme.desc: A mother attempts to keep her family safe as war rages and a sniper lies in wait outside her home. Drama, starring Hiam Abbass, Diamand Bou Abboud and Juliette Navis. In Arabic.

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French.

programme.title: Miles
programme.desc: A teenage lad is desperate to move to Chicago and joins the volleyball team to get a scholarship. The problem is his high school only has a girls squad. Comedy drama, starring Missi Pyle, Stephen Root and Paul Reiser.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey.

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: The personal stories of American soldiers sent to fight on the Pacific island of Guadalcanal during the Second World War. The men, among them a former deserter, are forced to confront their fears and beliefs during a bitter conflict for control of a key airfield. Terrence Malick's Second World War drama, adapted from James Jones' 1962 novel. Starring Sean Penn, Ben Chaplin, Nick Nolte, Jim Caviezel and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A high-school dropout in the 1970s lands a job with a leading hardcore porn director, and is thrown into a strange world inhabited by bizarre characters - only to find fame and fortune come at a price. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Burt Reynolds, Julianne Moore, William H Macy, Heather Graham and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto.(n)

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted
programme.desc: A would-be writer in the 1960s is committed to an exclusive psychiatric ward by her parents after attempting suicide, but the move seems to cause more problems than it solves. Fact-based drama, starring Winona Ryder and an Oscar-winning Angelina Jolie alongside Clea Duvall, Brittany Murphy, Whoopi Goldberg and Vanessa Redgrave.(n)

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine.(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teenage Ohio skateboarders find their friendship tested when they cross paths with an underworld criminal. Drama, starring Jorge Lendeborg Jr, Moises Arias and Rafi Gavron.(n)

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: A jaded computer programmer goes to bizarre lengths to get fired from his dull job - but his new laid-back attitude leads to unexpected promotions as his arrogance is taken for supreme self-confidence by unwitting bosses. Satirical comedy, starring Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, Ajay Naidu and Gary Cole.(n)

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: A teenage journalist is hired to write about a rock band and joins the group on tour, to the horror of his doting mother. While struggling to meet his deadline, he falls under the spell of the charismatic lead guitarist and a free-spirited groupie - but the youngster is forced to grow up fast before the manic world of rock 'n' roll overwhelms him. 1970s-set comedy drama, with Patrick Fugit, Billy Crudup, Kate Hudson and Frances McDormand.(n)

programme.title: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: A group of Turkish special forces soldiers set out on a dangerous mission to rescue a journalist from Islamic State militants. In Turkish. War drama, starring Ozan Agac, Bedii Akin and Murat Arkin.(n)

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre.

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Springtime with Roo
programme.desc: The gang's Easter celebrations come under threat when Rabbit grumpily refuses to join in, preferring to spend the day spring cleaning. Roo comes up with a plan to cheer him up and remind him that he used to love the holiday. Animated adventure, narrated by David Ogden Stiers and featuring the voices of Jim Cummings, Ken Sansom and Jimmy Bennett.

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Toy Story 3

At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder with the aid of a legendary hero. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.title: Your Friend the Rat
programme.desc: Animated short, in which Remy and Emile, the rodent characters from Ratatouille, try to convince the human race that their species is not as unpleasant as they seem and demonstrate the relationship between people and rats throughout history. With the voices of Patton Oswalt and Peter Sohn.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.(n)

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.(n)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Student creatures Mike and Sulley attend university to learn how to be scary, but their rivalry gets them both kicked off the course. The monstrous duo must learn how to work together if they are to realise their dreams of terrifying children. Animated comedy prequel, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin

Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Prom
programme.desc: High-school students eagerly look forward to their graduation party, but have personal and romantic issues to deal with along the way. The class president is determined everything needs to be perfect and is frustrated by a fellow student's interference - only to have a change of heart and realise he may be her perfect date. Comedy drama, with Aimee Teegarden and Thomas McDonell.(n)

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.

programme.title: Blinky Bill: The Movie
programme.desc: A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn.

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: When a cosmic blunder leaves Earth in the path of an asteroid, it's up to Sid the sloth and pals Manny and Diego to save the day. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, Denis Leary and John Leguizamo.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: Premiere. Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jackie Chan, Dave Franco and Fred Armisen.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: A girl the size of her mother's thumb leads a lonely life, until she falls in love with the similarly tiny prince of the fairies. However, their romance is cut short when she is kidnapped by a family of toads and faces a perilous journey through a forest to return home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Gary Imhoff and John Hurt.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.

programme.title: The Dragon Spell
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on a quest to save the world of humans and the world of magic, with the aid of an aspiring wizard and feral wild child. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Viktor Andrienko, Kate Bristol and Allen Enlow.

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure.(n)

programme.title: DC Superhero Girls: Super Hero High
programme.desc: Supergirl joins a school for superheroes and has to learn to harness her powers, while the junior detective club investigates a mysterious rash of security breaches. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voice of Anais Fairweather.(n)

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: A pair of elementary school pranksters inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure, with the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
