Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this drama in which Academy Award winner Angelina Jolie's kidnapped son is found alive. She realizes that the child returned to her is not her own. She faces corrupt police and a skeptical public in her relentless pursuit of answers, only to be confronted by a truth that will change her forever. Set in 1920s Los Angeles, the film also stars Academy Award nominee John Malkovich.

programme.title: Queen of the Desert

Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent').(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: In the Season 1 premiere, suburban wife and mom Tara Gregson tries to lead a normal life with her husband Max and teenage children Kate and Marshall while suffering from multiple personalities including spunky teenager "T," gun-toting Vietnam vet "Buck" and '50s-style Betty Crocker homemaker "Alice.".(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Mild Violence

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Tara feels like a failure as a mother when she is unable to counsel her children about school and sex, so she turns to her perfect-homemaker personality "Alice" for help.(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: The Mystery of the Wax Museum
programme.desc: Chiller about a maniac who uses wax-coated bodies for his displays. Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray, Glenda Farrell, Frank McHugh. Ralph: Allen Vincent. Harold: Gavin Gordon. Dr. Rasmussen: Holmes Herbert. Joe: Edwin Maxwell. Sparrow: Arthur Edmund Carewe. Michael Curtiz directed.

programme.title: Doctor X
programme.desc: A newspaperman investigates a wave of full-moon murders that have a cannibalistic bite to them.

programme.title: Absolute Quiet
programme.desc: A financer, a corrupt governor and others are held hostage on a ranch by escaped convicts.

programme.title: The Vampire Bat
programme.desc: When corpses drained of blood appear in a village, town elders suspect a vampire is on the loose. Policeman Karl Brettschneider doubts the existence of vampires, but Dr. Otto von Niemann argues to the contrary. Fingers point at the village idiot, Herman Gleib, but after local vigilantes get him out of the picture, the killings continue. Brettschneider tries to keep a cool head as he searches for possibly supernatural answers.

programme.title: Mark of the Vampire
programme.desc: Tod Browning directed this remake of his 1927 silent thriller "London After Midnight," but moved the action to a remote Middle European village, where strange evils stalk the inhabitants and a police inspector teams with an occult expert to investigate.

programme.title: The Gorilla
programme.desc: When a simian escapes a zoo, a series of murders occur and a lawyer fears he is next, so he hires detectives to protect him.

programme.title: The First Traveling Saleslady
programme.desc: The comic adventures of corset-selling ladies who go to Texas at the turn of the century. Ginger Rogers, Carol Channing. Masters: Barry Nelson. Carter: David Brian. Kingdom: James Arness. Cal: Robert Simon. Rice: Clint Eastwood. Directed by Arthur Lubin.

programme.title: Lafayette Escadrille
programme.desc: WWI saga of the American flying unit of the French Air Corps. Tab Hunter. Renee: Etchika Choureau. Drillmaster: Marcel Dalio. Tom: Jody McCrea. Duke: David Janssen. Bill: Bill Wellman Jr. Outstanding aerial photography. Directed by William A. Wellman.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in a farce about a brawling trucker, a singer (Sondra Locke) and a beer-guzzling orangutan. Orville: Geoffrey Lewis. Echo: Beverly D'Angelo. Ma: Ruth Gordon. Tank: Walter Barnes. Clerk at DMV: George Chandler. Woody: Roy Jenson. Directed by James Fargo.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A deadly man with no name arrives in an Old West town ravaged by the brutal feud between two rival factions, and amid the deadly fray, comes up with a scheme to play the two sides perfectly and get rich in the process.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Two rival bounty hunters unite to track a sadistic outlaw and his gang, and fight for survival in the desert. (repeat).

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Sergio Leone's finale in the Man With No Name trilogy centers on the taciturn, enigmatic loner trying to beat his rivals, a ruthless bounty hunter and a Mexican bandit, to a cache of hidden gold.

programme.title: Hang 'em High
programme.desc: A rancher survives a vicious attack by a lynch mob who accused him of stealing cattle, and he sets out for revenge by becoming a deputy marshal and agreeing to bring in alive the men he is looking for so they can face trials.

programme.title: Coogan's Bluff
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff seeks a fugitive killer in NYC while romancing a pretty probation officer. When the apprehended killer makes a daring escape, the real chase begins.

programme.title: Where Eagles Dare
programme.desc: Allied soldiers disguised as Nazi officers infiltrate a seemingly impenetrable mountaintop castle in the Bavarian Alps to rescue a captured American general who knows the plans for D-Day.

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: World War II heist actioner with Clint Eastwood sneaking a motley trio of fellow U.S. soldiers behind enemy lines to retrieve a fortune in Nazi gold bullion. Don Rickles and Donald Sutherland provide comic relief.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: In her first Oscar-winning performance, Katharine Hepburn plays an aspiring actress trying to get a start in the Broadway theater, where she engages in an affair with a producer, while being loved from afar by a reserved playwright.

programme.title: Song of Love
programme.desc: Set in 1840s Germany, composer Robert Schumann's wife, Clara, deals with his failing mental and physical health, and the rejection of his ambitious operatic works.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters come of age during the American Civil War under the guidance of their mother, as their father is absent, ministering to the troops.

programme.title: Mary of Scotland
programme.desc: John Ford's account of 16th-century court intrigue and politics involving Mary Stuart, Queen of Scotland, and the rivalry with her British cousin, Elizabeth Tudor, for the English throne.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story
programme.desc: In this Best Picture nominee, Katharine Hepburn re-creates her Broadway role as a divorced society woman preparing for her wedding while fending off the advances of a magazine reporter and her ex-husband. Playwright Philip Barry's comedy of manners captures "the privileged class enjoying its privileges" and landed Donald Ogden Stewart a Best Screenplay Oscar and James Stewart a Best Actor award as the journalist. (cc).

programme.title: Suddenly, Last Summer
programme.desc: A society matron offers a New Orleans brain surgeon a million-dollar grant on the condition that he lobotomize her niece, who witnessed the murder of her cousin, the matron's son, the previous summer and who has been institutionalized ever since.

programme.title: Pat and Mike
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy-Katharine Hepburn romp about a likable but unscrupulous sports promoter who helps a female golfer overcome her nervousness during competitions, and the two fall for each other while also dealing with some shady gamblers. Ruth Gordon and Garson Kanin's script was Oscar-nominated.

programme.title: Bringing Up Baby
programme.desc: Screwball comedy about a dog with a taste for dinosaur bones, a housebroken leopard named Baby, a madcap heiress who sets her cap for an absent-minded paleontologist, and a wacky menagerie of secondary characters. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Desk Set
programme.desc: An efficiency expert shakes up a TV network's research department by installing a computer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Stage Door
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is a portrait of aspiring actresses in a theatrical rooming house, among them are a debutante newcomer, her caustic roommate and a sweet actress who's literally starving. An adaptation of the Edna Ferber-George S. Kaufman play.(n)

programme.title: Without Love
programme.desc: Two WWII scientists decide to marry—not out of love, but out of scientific interest. All is fine until an ex-girlfriend appears, and both parties discover that perhaps not all is as platonic as it seems.(n)

programme.title: The Madwoman of Chaillot
programme.desc: A group of Parisian eccentrics rally to save their city from avaricious industrialists. Based on the stage play by Jean Giraudoux.(n)

programme.title: The Sailor Takes a Wife
programme.desc: A couple get married after one night, but as they begin setting up house together, they realize that they don't know much about each other, and marriage might be harder than it seems.(n)

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: A drifter falls for a devastating femme fatale and they murder her much older husband, the roadhouse owner who hired him. When the two are ultimately arrested, a slimy lawyer may be able to help them avoid jail.(n)

programme.title: The Cockeyed Miracle
programme.desc: When a shipbuilder dies suddenly of a heart attack, he is summoned to heaven by the ghost of his father. However, he chooses to stick around on Earth to wrap up some unresolved issues and help his family.(n)

programme.title: The Beginning or the End
programme.desc: A look at the dawn of the Atomic Age, from the the Manhattan Project to the bombing of Hiroshima in l945.(n)

programme.title: Any Number Can Play
programme.desc: Clark Gable plays the owner of a casino who has a full share of personal and professional problems. Determined to get his wife and child back, he cleans up his act.(n)

programme.title: Man in the Dark
programme.desc: A crook (Edmond O'Brien) agrees to a brain operation that results in amnesia. Audrey Totter. Lew Landers directed.(n)

programme.title: The Sellout
programme.desc: A newspaper editor exposes a crooked sheriff, with dire consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Set-Up
programme.desc: Exposé of corruption in the boxing world, centered on the story of an aging, “washed-up” prizefighter.(n)

programme.title: Mission Impossible III
programme.desc: In the third installment in the "Mission: Impossible" series, retired superspy Ethan Hunt is called back into action to battle a ruthless arms dealer. (cc).

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth. (cc).

programme.desc: In the third installment in the "Mission: Impossible" series, retired superspy Ethan Hunt is called back into action to battle a ruthless arms dealer. (cc).

programme.desc: An elderly man is forced to defend his shop from an armed robbery. The resulting investigation has Lupo and Bernard probing ulterior motives for the crime. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: The disfigured body of a campaign volunteer is found with the word "FED" scrawled on his chest, kicking off an investigation that turns up numerous suspects. Rey Curtis: Benjamin Bratt. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate the murder of a journalist, and the probe embroils a talk-show host (Samantha Bee) in a scandal involving numerous workplace liaisons and a blackmail attempt. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a family is found brutally murdered in their home, Detectives Lupo and Bernard track down two leads---a troubled, runaway teenager and a suspect who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Lupo and Bernard probe the murder of a high-school student whose body was burned in a parking lot, and the investigation uncovers a shocking cell-phone video, a shady educator and phony alibis. Moses: Aaron Shaw. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A scientist survives a mankind-destroying virus and struggles to live in a New York City overflowing with cannibalistic zombies that come out only at night. (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The body of a fatally stabbed young actress is found at the home of a Broadway composer (John Shea). Dr. Frederick Barrett: Robert Foxworth. Lisa Cutler: Kathleen Chalfant. Margot Dalton: Molly Regan. Dr. Felicity Cyrus: Ami Brabson. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate a nightclub fire that began with a rock band's flamethrowers and resulted in 23 fatalities. Teddy: John Doe. Teresa: Aleksa Palladino. Linda: J. Smith-Cameron. Kathy Teller: Jenna Stern. Eddie: Jonathan Togo. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A murder investigation leads to a case of stolen identity and revenge. Lonnie Jackson: Paul Benjamin. Shambala Green: Lorraine Toussaint. Aaron Miller: Roscoe Lee Browne. Dr. Paul Jackson: Ruben Santiago-Hudson. Horace Worthington: Carl Gordon. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man shoots four police officers to death, and the investigation reveals a protective mother and evidence that the victims may have known the shooter. When an arrest is made, the ensuing trial pits cops and detectives against the prosecutors. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A global-warming symposium becomes a crime scene after a scientist is poisoned and collapses during a speech. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A model's body is set ablaze in an alley, kicking off an investigation that forces Lupo and Bernard to retrace the steps of two party crashers who made an appearance at a political event. Meanwhile, Lt. Van Buren faces health-care woes. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a young socialite points Lupo and Bernard toward the victim's cousin, and the ensuing investigation exposes a hefty inheritance, a secret romance, a fraudulent adoption and an unborn child. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A stabbing victim dies after being left at a hospital, and the investigation exposes an exploited family. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(c)

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(c)

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(c)
